game.title: Lexatron
game.description: Lexatron is a word race! Form words on the X-shaped board to snake a path from one corner of the board to the other. Reach your star space first and win! Detonate a bomb to clear a path and keep going if your opponent blocks your way! Lexatron is easy to learn but forces the player to make tough strategic decisions. Lexatron provides an upgrade path for millions of bored "Words with Friends" players.
game.history: Lexatron was designed, developed, and tested over the course of 10 weeks in the summer of 2012.

features.feature: Casual, asynchronous, 2-player gameplay for iOS devices including the new iPhone 5
Sleek graphics with an isometric game board
Challenge your friends from Facebook, Twitter, or your address book
Pass-and-play matches when you are sitting next to a friend
Universal app for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad
Uses familiar word list and scoring system
